item.title: Dave Franco on Starring in a Luigi Mangione Film: “Let’s Just Say I’m Open”
item.description: The ‘Together’ star has been asked the question various times, though he reiterated that “no one has approached me about it yet," when referring to a movie centered around Mangione.

item.title: Luigi Mangione Musical Eyes More Cities After Sold-Out San Francisco Run
item.description: The musical satirizes the real-life circumstances of Mangione being housed in the same detention center as Diddy and Sam Bankman-Fried.
